Package DAOs

Class GameDAO

java.lang.Object
DAOs.GameDAO
public class GameDAO extends Object
Class that represents the Data Access Object that deals with games.

    • insertNewGame

      public void insertNewGame(Game game) throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      Takes a given game and puts the information into the Database.
      Parameters:
      game - An existing game that hasn't been put into the DB.
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - If an error occurs trying to insert a game.

    • findGame

      public Game findGame(int gameID) throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      Given a gameID this function returns a given game name in our DB.
      Parameters:
      gameID - A unique integer that corresponds to a given game
      Returns:
      The Game object with the corresponding game ID.
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - If an error occurs trying to find a game.

    • findAllGames

      public ArrayList<Game> findAllGames() throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      Returns all game names of currently existing games
      Returns:
      Returns an array list of Game objects, each of which is a game name.
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - If an error occurs trying to find all games.

    • ClaimSpotInGame

      public void ClaimSpotInGame(String username) throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      Takes in a username and stores it as white or black
      Parameters:
      username - A String to store in the game.
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - If an error occurs trying to claim spot in a game.

    • UpdateGame

      public void UpdateGame(Game chessGame) throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      Given a game, it will update the chessGame string in the database to reflect the current status of the game.
      Parameters:
      chessGame - A Game object.
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - If an error occurs trying to update a game.

    • RemoveGame

      public void RemoveGame(Game chessGame) throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      Removes a game from the DB.
      Parameters:
      chessGame - A game Object
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - If an error occurs trying to delete a game.

    • ClearGames

      public void ClearGames() throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      Removes all games from the DB.
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - If an error occurs trying to delete all games.
